mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO AS menuNo , B.MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , B.MENU_NM AS menuNm , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , (SELECT C.URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS linkUrl FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS A, COMTNMENUINFO B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.USE_AT = B.USE_AT AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.MENU_NO > 0 AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmpUniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
